{/* textDecoration has to set to none or else the button will have a line below the Login text */} {/* The top part, seat description */} {/* Parent class, defiines the row*/} {/* Children class, defiines the column*/} Seat #120 Description - Some dscription about the chair

- This box should be dynamic depending on the id of the seat. {/* Booking Button*/} Forget Password? {/* textDecoration has to set to none or else the button will have a line below the Login text */} Password Reset

); } export default SeatInformationPage;
